text: Great sessions, Jon! Hope to see some of y'all there!
Spotlight: *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recRGe3uzvAQV7rsd|Breaking Into Uncharted Territory>* starts in 15 minutes.
When watching “<https://join.inbound.com/s/recIvhaJ9Zs8aGjUK|Delivering a More Connected Customer Experience with Payments>” and you see <@U25C65C3S> on the screen: <https://gph.is/g/4gA8yAJ>
Is there no spotlight on right now? It seems to have disappeared.
Does anybody know what platform HubSpot is using to build this event? agenda/video/chat/etc?

should be a bubble that showed up saying
> We apologize for any confusion, Unfortunately, Dennis Woodside of Impossible Foods is unable to join us today and his session has been cancelled and removed from the agenda.
Ok thanks! I think I saw something pop up but I clicked elsewhere and it disappeared.
it’s a custom made solution :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U2H3TT8F2> nice, good job. That's a huge undertaking
indeed! I’ll let the team know you like the platform, our teams loving hearing the positive feedback for sure!
Spotlight: *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recU087EPBsMtormj|Social Responsibility at Scale>* starts in 15 minutes.
This has been a great talk so far! I really liked how Sarah mentioned that eco-friendly has to be available to all
Spotlight: *<https://join.inbound.com/s/recjXzJSlpdx58EX6|The Power of Growing Pains>* starts in 15 minutes.
thank god they paid for powerpass for me, because i spent that session on the phone with a bank reporting attempted identity theft.
i was super looking forward to this one

been through the bank identity theft garbage, not fun at all.

Ditto also on missing the talk myself, was in a meeting, will need to watch it after the fact
Sorry to hear about that <@UDEASNWEB> :disappointed: Hopefully you got it sorted out!
i’m not fully convinced that i did, but so far there’s no evidence the account is actually in my name.
Who is with me at <https://join.inbound.com/session/recNLDeC4CunTxkpK|Rise of the RevOps Developer>?
Really enjoying this! Love hearing more about Custom Objects and also how it can integrate with the CMS
If anyone has anything from this session that they're interested in having a deeper dive on, let me know :slightly_smiling_face: We're continuously working on creating new Academy content for y'all
I’ve loved the <https://join.inbound.com/s/rec2SFadeRoBndnyS|Designing Inclusive Digital Content session> so far. Great stuff

Brooke, this answer might be annoying...but I'm interested in a deep dive of everything Connor has presented.  This is such a good session and I've been looking to get into this.  Thanks for taking our feedback!
i'll have to go back and watch this session, I wanted to attend this one, too, but I couldn't decide between the RevOps session at the same time!
Awesome, thanks for this feedback, Jim!
I’ve been working with everything that Connor mentioned, but some great examples and cases would be awesome to inspire my colleagues!
Awesome, Teun. We're definitely looking at bringing more case studies into our education
I highly recommend everyone with a powerhouse pass to watch Rise of the RevOps developer by Connor. It is an amazing session for everyone who is developing in HubSpot.
Spotlight: *<https://join.inbound.com/s/rec8bLds2ekcEvAAz|Drawing Ambition Out of Yourself and Others>* starts in 15 minutes.
I thought Alyssa Smith of Audio Eye had some cool things to say that's important for us folks to keep in mind when building out stuff :slightly_smiling_face:
Yeah she had a lot of good advice. Stoked to hear the accessibility talk tomorrow by Judith Huemann.
